attributes.action: Immediate Capitol Punishment for Murderers Paedophiles Rapists and Terrorists
attributes.additional_details:
I, like many thousands of the decent people of society would like to see the reintroduction of Capitol punishment for Murderers, Paedophiles, Rapists and Terrorists.
With current advances in D.N.A. technology, and where guilt is irrefutable, these people should be fast tracked into court, sentenced to death, and said sentence should be carried out within 72 hours
We should also be able to try and sentence foreign nationals who have committed these crimes abroad
